Counter Strike Warfield 1.6 HD created by Schultz 

* install from setup.exe
* the kit have 481 MB, installed 970 MB
* Recommended resolution is 1024x768 , for perfect grafic
* it works great on any server via lan or internet 
* english language
* this game generates an unique SteamID so is possible to get in conflict with the original instalation of Steam!
